STBLKeyStringList.Text: {0.SimFirstName} has sabotaged a {1.ObjectName} and will avoid grabbing anything from it. Other Sims beware the effects {M0.his}{F0.her} tampering will have on its contents.
The entwined tastes of the tart apple and sweet caramel delight the senses.
Melted cheese just seems to melt your taste buds.
One can always count on Sparkling Apple Juice to keep one lively.
It has a strange tangy, umami, electric flavor.
Something about this drink's flavor hits home.
Something about this food's flavor hits home.
No Party is complete without a bit of luxury
Nothing can keep {0.SimFirstName} from partying all night long!
Something just doesn't taste right, but that's not gonna stop {0.SimFirstName}'s desire to dance or party!
A cocktail that glows is one sure to delight the tummy and sparkle the evening with pizzazz and flash. Mix a drink behind the Shine Bar and start the evening off rightly.
A vessel for luxury party beverages.
A deliciously caramel covered apple. So delicious.
Gooey, melty, irresistible cheese dipper. A staple in luxury parties.
Perfectly confectioned strawberry dipped in chocolate.

This repository of flavor and delightful tastes is stacked and tiered perfectly for a party or ambitious solo evening. With the Fountain of Mirth, you’ll have a mouthful to share with others. Now with more flavors!
Light emanating from a straight source has been scientifically proven to be boring and a "major downer" for the evening. Sprout light particles from an undulating surface -- the Lamp de Twist!

Right as the clock strikes midnight, the Dream Ruffles are set stylishly to capture your passion, hopes, and yes, dreams! With every swish and evocative caress of a window, the Dream Ruffles encapsulate everything special about midnight.
Unhntz uhntz uhntz uhntz. You hear it? You feel it? You see it? Alert your senses. The Pulse Panels are pushing light onto the floor, but you gotta do the rest with your entire body. FEEL IT.

This club is for the fancy, the upper crust, the well known, and the it listers. If they sit, and they don't, they do so on the Uptight Stool - a piece of furniture built exclusively to support the egos of those seated upon it.
Be you debutante, wall flower, or night beast, the Chiawowi Seat is a perfect temporary waypoint on which to plan your next move.
It was deemed the Ottoman seat was just not stylish enough. Not refined enough. Not PARTY enough. Hence, the Parttoman. A slammin' good time, but also, an Ottoman.

Renowned culinary enthusiast Gerhardt von Foodenschnutz decried the lack of surfaces that could support not one, not two, but more than that amount for food. Von Foodenschnutz wanted a way to show off everything he and his guests wanted to eat. While walking along a particularly lengthy flat surface, he had his eureka. The Banquetia Plateau, perfect for serving food to large parties!

With the ability to showcase numerous dishes at once, this table is just what your Sim needs for his or her next sophisticated soirée. Showcase your Sim's "Around the World in Foodie Days" appetizer spread or just throw down some Mac and Cheese and be done with it. No matter the level of effort put into the actual food, this table will make your repast look like gourmet dining!
Not the typical table for dinner, or brunch, definitely not brunch, the Table Sequinas is a flashy surface that repels the boring and tedious types who go to sleep before midnight.
The Boom Cube is a perfect surface, or series of surfaces. It is a cube after all. Eat on it, but only if you're going to be daring. And don't leave things on it! Such behavor demeans the Boom Cube.
A necessity for pouring the right amount of liquids for your recipes.
There are no slots for food to be placed on the banquet table
This Fountain has already had something added.
Unlock this interaction by reaching Cooking Skill Level 4
Unlock this interaction by reaching Mixology Skill Level 3
This Fountain has already been improved.
{1.ObjectName}! Now with 100% more zest thanks to {0.SimFirstName}!
Purchase a Banquet Table from Build Mode.
Purchase the Fountain of Mirth from Build Mode.
